original_title: The Fable of the Throbbing Genius of a TankTown Who Was Encouraged by Her Folks Who Were Prominent
overview: A silent short film of 1916 directed by Richard Foster Baker. The subject is taken from a story by George Ade .
title: The Fable of the Throbbing Genius of a TankTown Who Was Encouraged by Her Folks Who Were Prominent
